title: Intermittent problem with automatic driving mode Pixel 4 XL
content:
My Pixel 4 XL has developed an issue where driving mode does not turn on automatically, even when the settings are set to turn on when connected to my vehicle.

For a while if I had the "Ask before turning on driving mode" switch on, it would raise a notification, then go into Android Auto (my choice for driving mode), but now that does not now work either - the screen refreshes and nothing happens.

I have toggled all the toggles trying to get this to happen automatically but it now does not.

Is there anything I can check to get this working?

I do note that if I set driving mode to DND then it works perfectly.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
